effect.x_y: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.

short_effect.x_y: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. User’s Electric moves have doubled power next turn.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. User’s Electric moves have doubled power next turn.

flavor_text.x_y: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. This also raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. This also raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.
